ichigo-kurosaki-bankai.name: Ichigo Kurosaki (Bankai)
ichigo-kurosaki-bankai.quote: I'm not fighting because I want to win, I'm fighting because I have to win!
ichigo-kurosaki-bankai.description: The evolved form of Ichigo's power, representing his mastery over his Shinigami abilities. In this state, his already formidable powers are compressed into a sleeker form, though the darkness that roars within him grows alongside his strength. As a Hybrid Range fighter, Bankai Ichigo combines Fast Melee combat with devastating Ranged attacks, utilizing both Charge moves and his unique 'Getsuga Aura' Gauge. He is also one of the few characters in the game who has access to a Reawakening. His Rushdown playstyle becomes even more aggressive, with the ability to Revive from near-death situations, leading to his Reawakening into his Full Hollowfication, where Ichigo becomes practically unstoppable. With balanced stats favoring Technique, Ichigo can adapt to any situation while maintaining constant pressure on his opponents.
ichigo-kurosaki-bankai.tldr: A Substitue Shinigami who quickly overwhelms foes. Those in Soul Society recognize him as an agent of destiny. Has multiple easy-to-use actions, such as his projectile Signature Move and Spiritual Pressure Move 1 with invincibility. Use Spiritual Pressure Move 2, Getsuga Aura to greatly strengthen every attack for a limited time. Use safe moves to charge Reiatsu and then overpower your opponent when the time is right. Reawakens automatically if defeated when Awakened with fully charged Fighting Spirit.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Getsuga Aura State
base.description: A signature upgrade state for Ichigo Kurosaki (Bankai). Entering Getsuga Aura State adds a Getsuga Aura Gauge and powers up your attacks. The Getsuga Aura Gauge goes down when you attack or receive enemy attacks.

base.name: Signature Move: Getsugatensho
base.description: Takes a stance before unleashing a Getsugatensho forward. Hold the input for a more powerful slash wave. Always unleashes a powerful slash wave in Getsuga Aura State.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Full Swing Strike
base.description: Strike a low stance before unleashing a brutal rising slash. You're invincible during the startup, letting you trigger this move to fend off attacks.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Getsuga Aura
base.description: Imbue Tensa Zangetsu with Spiritual Pressure to wreathe your blade in a Getsuga. You enter Getsuga Aura State after using this move, strengthening various attacks.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Rushing Stab
base.description: A thrust while rushing forward. Lets you close in on your foe while attacking. Useful for offense, but puts you at a disadvantage when guarded. Can use additional attacks on hit and allows for a Quick Attack follow-up in Getsuga Aura State.

awakened.name: Awakening: Hollowfication
awakened.description: Ichigo rips at his face, drawing black and red Reiryoku as his Hollowfication is donned.

awakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Getsuga Aura State
awakened.description: A signature upgrade state for Ichigo Kurosaki (Bankai). Entering Getsuga Aura State adds a Getsuga Aura Gauge and powers up your attacks. The Getsuga Aura Gauge goes down when you attack or receive enemy attacks.

awakened.name: Signature Move: Getsugatensho
awakened.description: Takes a stance before unleashing a Getsugatensho forward. Hold the input for a more powerful slash wave. Always unleashes a powerful slash wave in Getsuga Aura State.

awakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Full Swing Strike
awakened.description: Strike a low stance before unleashing a brutal rising slash. You're invincible during the startup, letting you trigger this move to fend off attacks.

awakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Getsuga Aura
awakened.description: Imbue Tensa Zangetsu with Spiritual Pressure to wreathe your blade in a Getsuga. You enter Getsuga Aura State after using this move, strengthening various attacks.

awakened.name: Special Flash Attack: Rushing Stab
awakened.description: A thrust while rushing forward. Lets you close in on your foe while attacking. Useful for offense, but puts you at a disadvantage when guarded. Can use additional attacks on hit and allows for a Quick Attack follow-up in Getsuga Aura State.

reawakened.name: Reawakening: Full Hollowfication
reawakened.description: Ichigo lies dead, suddenly grasping the ground as Reireyoku collates around him, rising once more like a demon unleashed from the bowels of Hell itself. As Ichigo raises his arched back, he stands ferocious, ready to rip and tear his foe to shreds.

reawakened.name: Signature Move: Cero
reawakened.description: Unleashes a Cero forward. The projectile is extremely fast, making it a powerful way to keep foes at bay at mid-range.

reawakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Rising Slash
reawakened.description: Strike a low stance, charge into a tackle forward and unleash a brutal rising slash. You're invincible during the tackle, letting you trigger this move to fend off attacks.

reawakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: I Will Protect You
reawakened.description: Charge up and viciously grab your foe (Breaker-type). Releases your Spiritual Pressure on hit to land a devastating attack. The grab is unblockable, letting you break the opponent's guard to deal massive damage.

reawakened.name: Special Flash Attack: Rush Attack
reawakened.description: A thrust while rushing forward. Lets you close in on your foe while attacking. Unleashes a powerful follow-up on hit.

kikon.name: Normal State Kikon Move 1: Point-Blank Getsugatensho
kikon.description: Destroys 2 Konpaku. Destroys 3 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 1: Point-Blank Getsugatensho
kikon.description: Destroys 3 Konpaku. Destroys 4 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 2: Grand Getsugatensho
kikon.description: Destroys 4 Konpaku. Destroys 5 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Reawakened Kikon Move 1: Cero Beam
kikon.description: Destroys 4 Konpaku. Destroys 5 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

baseCombos.name: Special Flash Attack Offensive Hohō Combo
Step Quick Attack Offensive Hohō Combo
baseCombos.input: ANY -> Q -> Q -> Q -> Q -> R

baseCombos.name: Step Quick Attack Kikon Combo
baseCombos.input: ANY -> Q -> Q -> Q -> Q -> KI

Step Quick Attack Offensive Hohō Combo
